## The tutorial of Function Analysis
We integrated [FAPROTAX](https://pages.uoregon.edu/slouca/LoucaLab/archive/FAPROTAX/lib/php/index.php) to predict the function of microbiota.

***

### Step 1
##### 1. Please upload the metadata (.tsv) and the taxonomic table file (.qza).
##### 2. After unploading, click on the button **"Start!"** to execute the analysis.

<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p5_1.png" width="100%" />

<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p5_2.png" width="100%" />

***

### Step 2
##### After finishing FAPROTAX, We provide a table and a barplot to interpret the result.
* **Summary:** Show the information of the function prediction.
* **Function table:** The table reveals that reads of the function types in every sample.
  + **Download the function table:** Click on the button **"Download the function table"** to downlaod the table.

<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p5_3.png" width="100%" />

* **Function barplot:** The horizontal bars indicate reads of each function and the bars will be grouped based on the metadata. 
  + **Choose the group:** Select the group and then the bars will be grouped based on the metadata.
  + **Download the function barplot:** Click on the button **"Download the function barplot"** to downlaod the barplot.

<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p5_4.png" width="100%" />
